document_data.caption: Front: an astral deva swinging his celestial mace.
document_data.name: ''Celestial Mace''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Celestial maces''''' were the favored weapons of [[astral deva]]s.
document_data.Description: It was described as a huge mace-like weapon.
document_data.Powers:
It had the power of a ''+3 [[mace of disruption]]'' or a ''+3 [[disruption]] [[heavy mace]]''.

It constantly glowed with the light of a [[torch]].
document_data.Creation: Forging one required the spell ''[[disrupting weapon]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners:
[[File:Astral deva 1e.jpg|thumb|right|''An astral deva carrying his mace.'']]
These maces were conventionally carried by astral devas,
